name: Crowe: The Drowned Armory
description: Welcome to the vibrant and mysterious world of Crowe in VR now updated with a NEW BONUS MODE, Survival Arena! Room scale puzzles, tactical bow & shield combat, damage dealing magical cross-pistols and gorgeous cinematic visuals that will sweep you to an alien world where science fiction meets high fantasy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600K CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon RX 470 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070, AMD Radeon RX 580 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
